post.text:
Departing Tampa, Florida!
MAKE AMERICA GREAT AGAIN!

comment.author: Kaylee
comment.text: Am i the only one to find it amusing that the group of men and women who have been in "charge" of this country for the last 8 years are the ones out front trying to tell the world its Mr. Trump's fault our country is falling apart

replies.author: Jena
replies.text: It's definitely no body's fault but our own....

replies.author: Kristin
replies.text: Yes it is amusing to me, Kaylee, if it wasn't such a serious matter it out would be down right funny

replies.author: Melissa
replies.text: Its becaues they cant look in the mirrors, they're already removed

replies.author: Zachary
replies.text: Yah the one who takes a Hawaii vacation every year in a mansion house on the beach. Talk about never saving tax payers money. My taxes went for his typical vacation.

replies.author: Kaylee
replies.text: Wait til our taxes more than double because we are all gonna get "free college."
